data.code:
const options = {
    owner: "sanchezcarlosjr",
    repo: "computer-vision-and-graphics",
    filePath: "assets/evanotebooks/image-processing.json",
    commitMessage: "Apply MediaPipe models, open your webcam and write your algoritms with OpenCV",
    GITHUB_TOKEN: ""
}

editor.blocks.get$.pipe(
  first(),
  map(content =>
    btoa(unescape(encodeURIComponent(JSON.stringify(content, null, 2).replaceAll(options.GITHUB_TOKEN, ""))))),
  commitOnGitHub(options)
)
